name: Tattered Rags
description: Barely holding together, these worn cloth scraps offer minimal protection but are better than nothing. Often worn by beggars and the desperate.

name: Goblin Hide Vest
description: Crude armor crafted from the hide of fallen goblins. Smells terrible and offers basic protection. The stitching is rough and uneven, typical of goblin craftsmanship.

name: Leather Jerkin
description: A simple leather vest reinforced with metal studs. Standard protection for merchants and town guards. Well-crafted but unremarkable.

name: Chainmail Hauberk
description: Interlocking metal rings provide solid protection against slashing attacks. Heavy but reliable, favored by professional soldiers and mercenaries.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: Masterfully forged steel plates cover vital areas. The mark of a true warrior, this armor has seen many battles and bears the scars to prove it.

name: Enchanted Mithril Mail
description: Woven from the finest mithril threads and blessed by ancient magic. Light as silk yet stronger than steel, it shimmers with an otherworldly glow.

name: Dragon Scale Cuirass
description: Crafted from the scales of an ancient red dragon. Naturally resistant to fire and incredibly durable. Each scale tells a story of the dragon's long life.

name: Celestial Plate
description: Forged in the heavens by divine smiths. This radiant armor glows with holy light and is said to turn away even the darkest magic.

name: Aegis of the Eternal Guardian
description: Legendary armor worn by the first guardian of the realm. Inscribed with runes of protection that have never been deciphered. It is said to make the wearer nearly invincible.

name: Void Emperor's Carapace
description: Forged from the essence of the void itself and tempered in the heart of a dying star. This ultimate armor exists partially outside reality, making its wearer nearly untouchable by mortal weapons.
